lead_paragraph: ORLANDO, Fla., Nov. 6 — With a 25-5 vote, general managers took the first step Tuesday to add instant replay to baseball games. The vote was a significant departure from previous votes at general managers meetings, where the issue had the support of, at best, half of those present.
